local_intent: Perceive the white plate, perform approach-and-align to 0.005 tolerance, set TCP yaw for final alignment, and verify visibility and orientation before contact/lower.
assumptions: Gripper is open (as in global plan) and robot is near pre-approach pose
White plate is within sensor view for DetectObject
Yaw=0 is the desired alignment for subsequent lowering/pick
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT step: perception of white_plate, ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1200, followed by orientation setup and verification prior to lowering and grasp.
